item.title: Prepare genesis.json for Kairos network
item.description: 1. Remove or backup existing genesis.json for Pre-cypress. 1) For CN, $ mv <your_klaytn_home_path>/kcnd/data/genesis.json <your_klaytn_home_path>/kcnd/data/genesis.json.pre-cypress 2) For PN, $ mv <your_klaytn_home_path>/kpnd/data/genesis.json <your_klaytn_home_path>/kpnd/data/genesis.json.pre-cypress If you finish this step, please click the next button > on the right side of this page.

item.title: Node Configuration
item.description: 1. Modify network, discovery and boot node information. ** Note that CN and PN have some different information. 1) For CN, your configuration should be modified as shown below. $ egrep "^NETWORK|NO_DISCOVER|BOOTNODES|ADDITIONAL" /etc/kcnd/conf/kcnd.conf NETWORK="baobab" NETWORK_ID= NO_DISCOVER=0 # setting 1 to disable discovery BOOTNODES="kni://979159c738bb0c8c60b36267c56d2b4d4a995326be666460c3d612856caab522ebe6f81ea5cdbb605051f12cbf8f787ce0f172256545a5b3400c751afbdcd0c8@13.209.190.55:32323?discport=32323&ntype=bn" ADDITIONAL="--state.trie-cache-limit 5000 --state.live-pruning" 2) For PN $ egrep "^NETWORK|NO_DISCOVER|BOOTNODES|ADDITIONAL" /etc/kpnd/conf/kpnd.conf NETWORK="baobab" NETWORK_ID= NO_DISCOVER=1 # setting 1 to disable discovery BOOTNODES="" ADDITIONAL="--state.trie-cache-limit 5000 --state.live-pruning" 2. item.title: Telegraf Configuration
item.description: 1. To monitor your nodes in Kairos Dashboard, please change the influxdb configuration as below: 1) For both CN and PN, $ grep -A2 "influxdb" /etc/telegraf/telegraf.d/klaytn.conf [[outputs.influxdb]] urls = [ "http://15.164.55.202:8086" ] database = "klaytn_beta_baobab" If you finish this step, please click the next button > on the right side of this page.
